content: ready for spooky crochet season this fun and festive halloween crochet cowl will have you in a ghoulish mood it s fun to make and even more exciting to wear all season long perfect for trick-or-treating or wearing to your local fall festival this cowl crochet pattern is also available for free on my blog the premium pdf includes a pattern chart a photo tutorial for the colorwork stitches and written directions for both right-handed and left-handed crocheters so you can use the version that s right for you dimensions approximately 35 88 9cm circumference 17 5 wide x 13 high 44 5cm x 33cm when lying flat materials needed size 2 fine/sport weight yarn such as hobbii friends extra fine merino in 6 colors g 4mm hook scissors yarn needle gauge not important for this pattern all of my patterns are tested by experienced pattern testers to ensure the pattern is easy to follow they are professionally edited to minimize errors and ensure the wording is consistent with industry
